monoidal_preadditive_of_faithful:
/-
Copyright (c) 2021 Scott Morrison. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Scott Morrison
-/
/-- A faithful additive monoidal functor to a monoidal preadditive category
ensures that the domain is monoidal preadditive. -/
theorem monoidal_preadditive_of_faithful {D} [Category D] [Preadditive D] [MonoidalCategory D] (F : MonoidalFunctor D C)
    [Faithful F.to_functor] [F.to_functor.additive] : MonoidalPreadditive D :=
  { tensor_zero' := by
      intros
      apply F.to_functor.map_injective
      simp [F.map_tensor]
    zero_tensor' := by
      intros
      apply F.to_functor.map_injective
      simp [F.map_tensor]
    tensor_add' := by
      intros
      apply F.to_functor.map_injective
      simp only [F.map_tensor, F.to_functor.map_add, preadditive.comp_add, preadditive.add_comp,
        monoidal_preadditive.tensor_add]
    add_tensor' := by
      intros
      apply F.to_functor.map_injective
      simp only [F.map_tensor, F.to_functor.map_add, preadditive.comp_add, preadditive.add_comp,
        monoidal_preadditive.add_tensor] }
#align monoidal_preadditive_of_faithful monoidal_preadditive_of_faithful

-- In any case it is true in any preadditive category.

  by
